title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person buried in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dead buried in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, burying the dead is one of the most painful moments in which the deceased leaves his relatives and loved ones and disappears under the dirt. Burying the dead or seeing the dead before burial disappears in different cases in which dreams appear, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing burying the dead in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn. Shaheen.Interpretation of the dream of seeing the body of a dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. When you see the dreamer dead and buried in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will travel to a far country and will not get money. Also, when the dreamer sees that he was buried in a grave and was alive in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will remain oppressed or oppressed.• When the dreamer sees that he is buried in a grave and is alive in the dream, this may mean that the dreamer will The dream will be imprisoned or imprisoned. Also, when the dreamer sees that he has surrendered to the bottom of the grave in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will surrender to death. When the dreamer sees that he was buried in a grave while he was alive and then died after that in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer The dream will die in this distress that it finds itself. Also, when the dreamer sees that he was buried in a grave while he was alive and then came out in the dream, this may mean that the dreamer will be saved from worry and injustice. • When the dreamer sees that he was buried and then came out in the dream, this may mean that the dreamer will sincerely repent Or he will get married. Likewise, if the dreamer sees that he is buried, then dirt is placed on him and his hands shake in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer has failed in his repentance. Interpretation of dreams to see two dead people buried in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen When the dreamer sees himself burying a person alive in a dream This may indicate that the dreamer will defeat his enemy. Also, when the dreamer sees that some people are burying a person in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will witness meeting these people until that person’s death. When the dreamer sees himself burying an enemy in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be victorious over the enemy. This enemy is in his waking life. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is burying an animal and that its gender is reprehensible in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will cast a person with these repulsive qualities. When the dreamer sees that he is burying an animal and that its gender is reprehensible in the dream, it may mean that the dreamer will provide Money or anything else. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is burying an animal and that its gender is loved in the dream, it may mean that the dreamer will feel remorse. When the dreamer sees himself burying an inanimate object in a dream, it may mean that the dreamer will be troubled in this world. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is burying something that was not buried in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will waste his property in vain. • When the dreamer sees himself burying the dead in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will participate in a forbidden marriage.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting a pig in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about hitting a pig in a dream In case you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about hitting a pig in a dream, one of the dreams is very disturbing, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must also prevent absolute disbelief because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth, And to be affected by it, in addition to the fact that the site and its managers have nothing to do with the interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a pig in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is hitting a pig, it may indicate that he will get rid of the hostility that was present in his life in the previous period. Hitting a pig in a dream can It indicates approaching the Blessed and Almighty God, and stopping the sins and disobedience that the dreamer was committing at that time. Dreaming of a pig in a dream may indicate the end of the financial crisis that the dreamer faced in his life during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he was beating a pig may indicate events Happiness comes to the dreamer after suffering, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about beating my grandmother in a dream: Beating my grandmother in a dream may indicate the large sum that the dreamer obtains during this period. It is possible that seeing the grandmother beaten in a dream indicates the blessings and good things that the dreamer receives during this time, and God knows best. Dream interpretation Beating a cat to death in a dream Beating a cat to death in a dream may mean an end to the worries and sadness that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. In the case of my personal opinion that he was beating the cat to death, this may indicate a rejection of a crisis and a problem that the dreamer was facing in that Time. Killing the cat due to repeated beatings may indicate the end of the injustice that was on the dreamer’s shoulders in those days, and God knows best. In the case of his personal view of beating the cat to death, this may indicate that he stopped the sin that he was doing at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting Satan in the form of a human being in a dream: Striking Satan who was present in human form could indicate the end of the crisis that the dreamer suffered during his life at that time. Whoever dreams that he is hitting Satan, it could indicate the end of envy or evil that occurred On him in those days. Beating Satan in a human form in a dream may indicate getting rid of the presence of evil people in the life of the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting my maid in a dream: The maid hitting the dreamer in a dream may indicate good things that will come to the dreamer during This time. If one sees the maid hitting him, this may indicate that circumstances have changed for the better, thanks to God. In the event that one sees the maid hitting him, this may indicate wrong decisions made by the dreamer and he must stop them immediately. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a thief in A dream: Anyone who dreams of beating a thief can indicate the strength and courage of the dreamer

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete carpet washed in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadout website offers you an interpretation of a dream about washing carpets. The carpet is spread on the floor and is found in the homes of many people around the world. Seeing carpets in a dream is full of visions that may have come in the dreams of many people, so we have collected for you, my dear, in God, everything related to the science of interpreting sleep about cleaning carpets from dust. The interpretation of dreams about washing carpets in a dream is complete for elderly women, married women, and pregnant women, as well as for men. If you are interested in the interpretation, you should follow the article. Why do you dream of Ibn Sirin’s carpet? Seeing carpets in a dream is complete. One of the visions that Ibn Sirin said in his book is that it shows a pure woman with good and beautiful qualities among people. Walking on whole carpets in a dream means being kind to the dreamer and living with a lot of money that will change the dreamer’s life full of wealth and songs. Also, buying whole carpets in a dream generally indicates a big profit for the person who has a vision of who he will reap. A stuffed carpet in a dream is one of the Visions that show a new home that the dreamer will find in his life. See also: Why do men and women dream of a piece of paper in a complete dream? Why dream of washing carpets in a dream, complete for a public woman? Seeing a public woman washing carpets in a complete dream means that she achieves desires and goals that she has always sought Achievement in her life and also indicates the girl's future life full of optimism, hope and success if the carpet is clean. And beautiful... The interpretation of seeing a red carpet indicates that the girl has good qualities and good morals in relations with people, and it also testifies to her success, reconciliation, and the removal of worries and problems that she suffered from in her previous life. Why dream of cleaning carpets from dust, considering that the girl occupies an excellent position In her life, which symbolizes her marriage to a powerful man who is rich in money. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing carpets for divorced women, from visions that portend the nearness of her goodness and the beginning of a new life that will make her happy and the appearance of a good man for her who will be for her in the place of all the problems that she was missing in her life. See also : Why dream of a curtain in a dream? Why dream of washing carpets for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of carpets is evidence of her firm belief that she is known to God. Buying whole carpets in a woman’s dream indicates her imminent pregnancy and she will have a beautiful woman who will help and support her in life if the carpet is green and beautiful, and God knows best. In Kamel’s dream, her husband presents her with a beautiful and elegant carpet. This indicates the immediate benefit that the woman will receive and indicates the fulfillment of the desire she wanted and her calling to God. In general, in her dream – evidence of food, abundance of money and pleasures. See also: What is the dream of washing clothes? Interpretation of washing carpets for a pregnant woman Book of dreams of wet and clean carpets in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the ease of her birth and the fact that she and her fetus will be healthy and better, and this is a harbinger of great goodness that You will receive it after giving birth. Also, buying carpets in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of the approaching due date

title: Interpretation of a ram in a dream for a single, married or pregnant girl

preview.html: Interpretation of the ram: It is either chasing me or attacking me, white and black, large and small, slaughtering, food, meat, cooking, and a sacrifice of a sheep or goat, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of the ram in a dream: A man’s vision of a ram in a dream has many connotations. The ram can be a symbol of the power that characterizes a man and can symbolize a president, a sultan, an imam, etc. Of those who have positions and offices. Loss of will and personality. A ram without horns could symbolize a sultan, a deposed or deposed president, and others who have offices and positions, or it could mean a person who has lost his right and his money and loved ones taken. Whoever sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a ram without a clear cause or reason in the dream This means that he regains the truth and goodness, if he dreams that he slaughters a ram in the Sunnah, that is: the slaughter was in the direction of the Qiblah, and the name of God was mentioned in the sacrifice and the like, but if he did not see that in his dream, then this portends and indicates injustice and great injustice that will befall him. And whoever sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a ram to eat its meat, then this is good for the food that may be with money or with his wife. And if a person sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a ram for the great sacrifice of Eid al-Adha, then this portends the recovery of the sick person, comfort after hardship, safety after fear, and the removal of distress. And freedom from what one fears. Whoever sees that he is slaughtering a ram in war, it means victory over the enemies, and whoever sees that he is buying a ram, it means responding to the request of an honorable person in need, so help him and be of assistance to him. As for the ram’s horn in a dream, its interpretation differs, as the ram’s horn is in a man’s dream. It means money, and a ram’s horn in a woman’s dream symbolizes her dignity and respect. As for the ram’s wool, it is a gift or a prize. If this wool is white, but if the ram’s wool is black, it means blessing and money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is carrying a ram on his back, this means that he will assume a position or responsibility with one of the honorable people. Whoever sees that he is skinning a ram, this means that he is stirring up strife between families, and whoever sees that he is riding a ram for the Eid heralds his trip to Hajj. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is eating ram meat and grilling the meat, he will get married soon, and whoever eats ram meat grilled, this portends the death of someone he knows will be killed, God forbid. Seeing a skinned ram in a place foretells the death of a person in that place, and as for gossip, seeing a fatty ram indicates money and many good things, and a thin, weak ram indicates want and poverty. Whoever sees in his dream that he is transformed into a ram, this means that he will gain money or money. A position or a prominent position through his marriage to a divorced or widow, or he may become a scholar, a lawyer, or a position. And God knows best, and after detailing the interpretation of seeing a ram by Ibn Sirin, we will mention the interpretation of seeing a ram in the dream of an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and other connotations. Seeing a ram in a dream (A ram) is in a dream an honest man who does not resist. (And whoever dreams) that the ram’s horn has been taken by him, then he has An honest man in a matter. By the command of an honest man, he owns his wealth and goodness, and inherits them by his command, or marries his daughter, and if he takes what is in his stomach, or follows his treasure, or obtains
preview.text: Interpretation of a ram either chasing me or chasing me, attacking me, black and white, big and small, slaughtering, food, meat, cooking, and sacrifice of a sheep or goat, by Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a ram in a dream A man seeing a ram in a dream has many connotations. A ram can be a symbol of the power that distinguishes a man and can symbolize the president, the sultan, the imam, etc. of those who have positions and offices. Loss of will and personality. A ram without horns can symbolize the sultan, the deposed or isolated president, and others who have offices and positions, or it may mean the person who lost his right and took his money and loved ones. And whoever sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a ram without a reason or a clear reason in the dream, this means that he is regaining the right and good, if he dreams that he is slaughtering the ram in the year, that is: the slaughter was in the direction of the Qiblah, and the name of God was mentioned in the sacrifice and the like, but if he did not see that in his dream, this portends and indicates the injustice and great injustice that will befall him. And whoever sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a ram to eat its meat, this is good for eating that may be with money or with his wife. And if one sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a ram for the sacrifice of the great Eid al-Adha, this portends the recovery of the sick, comfort after hardship, safety after fear, and the removal of distress. And freedom from what he fears. And whoever sees that he slaughters a ram in war, it means victory over enemies, and whoever sees that he buys a ram, it means responding to the request of a needy honorable person, so he helped him and was a help to him. As for the ram's horn in a dream, its interpretation differs, as the ram's horn in a man's dream means money, and the ram's horn in a woman's dream symbolizes her dignity and respect. As for the ram's wool, it is a gift or a prize, so if this wool is white, but if the ram's wool is black, it means blessing and money. . And whoever sees in his dream that he is carrying a ram on his back, this means that he will assume a position or responsibility with one of the honorable people. Whoever sees that he is skinning a ram, this means that he is stirring up strife between families, and whoever sees that he is riding a ram for the holiday, it heralds his journey to Hajj. . As for whoever sees in his dream that he is eating ram meat and grilling the meat, he will marry soon, and whoever eats grilled ram meat, this portends the death of someone he knows will be killed, God forbid. And seeing a skinned ram somewhere foretells the death of a person in that place, and as for gossip, seeing a fat ram indicates money and many good things, and a thin, weak ram indicates need and poverty. And whoever sees in his dream that he turns into a ram, this means that he will gain money, a position, or a prestigious position by marrying a divorced or widowed woman, or he may become a scholar, a lawyer, or a position. And God knows best, and after detailing the interpretation of seeing a ram by Ibn Sirin, we mention the interpretation of seeing a ram in the dream of an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and other indications. Seeing a ram in a dream (ram) is in a dream an irresistible, honest man. (And whoever dreams) that the ram's horn has taken him, then he has an honorable man in a matter. He possesses the matter of an honest man, his money and his good, and inherits it by his command, or marries his daughter, and if he takes what is in his stomach, or follows his treasury, or obtains

title: Interpretation of vitiligo in a dream. Leprosy in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dreaming of a skin disease, leprosy, or vitiligo in the face and body on the left arm, leg, and neck, according to Ibn Sirin, for an unmarried woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. White, black, red spots, boils, blisters. Vitiligo in a dream is one of the difficult and frightening dreams that we see in our dreams to a large extent, and it causes horror and fear for the dreamer who is afraid to see it in the dream, as it carries many meanings, signs, and indications that come to the dreamer that must be paid a lot of attention to, as Vitiligo is a disease that greatly affects the skin and causes psychological exhaustion to the dreamer. Imam Ibn Sirin, the international interpreter of dreams, interpreted seeing vitiligo in a dream with many important meanings and sayings that must be taken seriously. Interpretation of vitiligo in a dreamVitiligo in a dream is unadorned clothing and is said in the expression of money, which is It is worthy of praise if it is on the hand or foot, and leprosy or vitiligo are among the bad sayings spoken by the fortuneteller, and most of them are unanimously agreed upon. This leprosy indicates the troubles of the soul and some of its worries, if it is in a place such as the head or the face. Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, said: Seeing leprosy in a dream spreading throughout parts of the body is a garment that the dreamer receives without adornment in reality, or it is money and money given to the dreamer while he is springy. It is also said that the appearance of leprosy and the spread of vitiligo on the human body in a dream is a good sign for the fortuneteller, especially if it spreads and appears in the areas of the hands and feet. As for what was reported by modern foreign translators, they indicated that leprosy or vitiligo in a dream is evidence of obscene or bad words spoken. About the dreamer when he is awake, or that the vision indicates worries, problems, and a bad psychological state. Which the fortuneteller afflicts is alert. Interpretation of vitiligo in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing an unmarried woman with vitiligo and seeing milky white spots appearing on her skin is evidence that she will fulfill the interest she wants. While a girl who sees in a dream that she has vitiligo on her face shows that she is suffering from worries. And sorrows and psychological crises. A girl who sees vitiligo appearing on her waist in a dream is evidence of pregnancy and will meet the boy of her dreams. Seeing a girl suffering from severe vitiligo and being happy is evidence of abundance of kindness and a lot of money. For a married woman to see that her hand is affected by vitiligo in a dream is evidence that she will reap Goodness, money and livelihood. A married woman who sees vitiligo appearing all over her body is evidence of the problems she will face with her husband and instability in her life. Seeing a married woman with vitiligo in limited parts of her body is evidence of nutrition and happy news coming to her. A married woman who sees that Her husband has vitiligo in a dream is evidence of good things that will come to her. Seeing a married woman feeling disgusted and extremely disgusted with her husband after suffering from vitiligo in a dream is an indication of the upcoming evil of her husband. Seeing a married woman suffering from vitiligo in the abdomen or waist is evidence of pregnancy. If she sees The married woman has vitiligo in her leg

A married woman who sees that Her husband has vitiligo in a dream is evidence of good things that will come to her. Seeing a married woman feeling disgusted and extremely disgusted with her husband after suffering from vitiligo in a dream is an indication of the upcoming evil of her husband. Seeing a married woman suffering from vitiligo in the abdomen or waist is evidence of pregnancy. If she sees The married woman has vitiligo in her leg

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a manager in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a director in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing a director in a dream through the books of interpretation of Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Ibn Katheer for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman. Seeing a director in a dream means success and success in life, advancement in work, obtaining a distinguished academic position, and family stability. We will explain it in detail to explain seeing a director in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a director in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees that she is doing her job perfectly and the director comes and assigns her additional work or duty, this indicates that success will always be her ally and she will enjoy a high position and status. If he laughs at her The manager or praised her performance, this may indicate that she will hear news that will make her happy and that she will enjoy a wonderful future. Interpretation of seeing a manager in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she works in a large company or a large factory and that the manager has assigned her serious and hard work and that she is able to complete it in a short time, then this It means that she will overcome difficulties and continue. Her home, her husband, her children, and taking care of their affairs. If she sees that she is ignoring her work and does not complete the tasks assigned to her, and she sees that the director is annoyed with her and speaks to her sharply and angrily, this could indicate material problems, fears, and tribulations. Interpretation of seeing a director in a dream for a pregnant woman: When she sees the director doing her work flawlessly. If she is flawless and satisfied with her performance, this indicates that she overcame difficulties and safely passed the period of pregnancy and childbirth. If she is slow in her work or does not master her work and the manager is upset and unhappy, this may indicate distress in her life and she may face difficulties during pregnancy and childbirth. Interpretation of a vision The director in a dream for a divorced woman: If she sees that she is submitting her papers for a job, talking to the manager, smiling, and accepting the job, this indicates the stability of her life and the end of distress and anxiety. If her performance is excellent and the director likes it, this may indicate the end of the problems and may indicate her return to divorce or marriage again. Other.Interpretation of seeing a manager in a dream for a man explains that if one sees in his dream that he is doing his job and he is enthusiastic and easy and completes his work in a very short time, this indicates that his life’s tasks have been completed and that he is managing them correctly, God willing. Be with him. If the dreamer sees a man in his dream that he neglects his work a lot and does not perform his duties properly and his manager comes and is angry, then this indicates some bad things that may happen to him but God will help him in this. . Interpretation of seeing a manager in a dream for young people: This also explains that if a young man sees in his dream that he is accepted at work and his manager is satisfied with him and respects him highly, then this indicates kindness and nourishment that will come to him, God willing. Very soon. If a young man sees in his dream that he is talking to his manager in a sarcastic way and there is no respect for that, then this indicates that he is bored in life without any goal and he must reconsider his calculations again, and God will be. With him, God willing.

title: Many dresses in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: But if the dreamer is married, then what the vision shows, we will learn from gptafser.com/ Interpretation of seeing many dresses in a dream for unmarried women from the point of view of some interpreters. Interpretation of seeing many dresses in a dream for one girlSeeing an unmarried girl in her dream wearing many One of the dresses is a praiseworthy vision. The vision shows her connection to the person she loves. The vision also indicates that this girl will achieve all the goals she wants. When a single girl sees a blue dress in her dream. The vision is good news, abundant goodness and abundant food. The vision also shows her connection to a person A rich person has great wealth and this person has a prominent position among people. Seeing a single girl in her dream in a black dress is a promising vision. This means that this girl will be associated with a well-off man. Also, this man does not have a lot of money and will not give her much. If an unmarried girl dreams She is looking for a dress for herself and does not find it. The vision showed that this girl is making uncertain decisions about her life. The dream also indicates her anxiety about losing someone close to her or being separated from the person she loves. When a single girl sees that someone is giving her a dress. The vision showed that This person loves the dreamer very much and wants to come to her with various efforts. She will repel him at first, but she will love him later, and God knows best. Seeing a single girl in her dream in a white dress. Good news for her and her relationship with a person known for good behavior and good morals among people. When a single girl sees a red dress in her dream The vision suggests that you will communicate with a person who had many relationships in his previous life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a pink dress for pregnant, single and married women. Interpretation of seeing many dresses in a dream for a married woman. To dream of many dresses in a married woman’s dream is a vision worthy of praise. Because it indicates On security, and that she enjoys a life full of peace and love with her family. The vision also means that the dreamer is trying in every way to perform his marital duties to the fullest. If a married woman sees a long dress in her dream. The vision was good news for her that she will be covered and will take care of her home and keep her husband’s secrets, She is a good wife. As for seeing a short dress in a married woman’s dream, it is not very promising. It indicates the difficulties and problems she faces with her life partner. These problems can reach the stage of separation and divorce. It also means that she sees that she is unable to bear the responsibility entrusted to her. With it. This vision means that the dreamer is not performing his duty to the fullest extent. When a married woman sees a white dress in her dream. The vision was a harbinger of joy, happiness, and good news that she will soon receive, God willing. The vision also shows that he will overcome the obstacles he faces. But when she saw a black dress, The vision indicated the difficulties and fears that she may face. As for a married woman who sees a red dress, the vision indicates an abundance of goodness and an imminent pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing many dresses in a dream about a man and its meaningWhen a man sees a dress

title: What did the jurists say about the interpretation of a dream about scorpions in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the home?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of dreaming of scorpions in a dream? Dreaming of a scorpion is not an easy matter, as it is one of the insects that lead to human death, so the first interpretation that comes to the dreamer’s mind is that he is in danger and expects bad events to occur. for him. The future, but interpreters put forward promising interpretations of the scorpion in several cases. We will learn through it. Egyptian website. Follow this article. Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in a dream. Below are the general interpretations of seeing scorpions in a dream, and we will list them in the following points: Or not: There is a dirty person who engages in behaviors that pollute his biography and reputation among people. And this person is trying to get close to the dreamer. There is no doubt that the person who has these qualities intends to attract the fortuneteller, as this is all bad and bad. Second: Perhaps the scorpion is a symbol of gossip, which is what some people practice while they are awake to the dreamer, and it is known that the purpose behind it was not It is not a scam, but rather distorting the dreamer's image in front of people. But if the dreamer is placed in a closed circle where no one can know anything about his secrets or privacy, he will protect himself from gossip as much as possible. Among the visions that commentators like is seeing someone turning into a scorpion in The dream. Message text: The one who became a scorpion in the dream is the one sleeping on you, so you should be careful and break off relations with him once and for all. Third: Scorpions in a dream, anxiety and judgments in reality, but dear dreamer, do not be pessimistic about this interpretation because scorpions have colors and sizes. Perhaps the dream reveals that you will fall into A fairly simple problem that does not deserve worry or panic. If you read the rest of the paragraphs, you will know that all the scorpions that appear in the dream do not mean misfortunes and disasters. Fourth: Perhaps the scorpion means the prestige of money. However, they will not continue in the dreamer’s life for reasons specific to his life. Fifth: Some translators have indicated The interpretation of scorpions, like the interpretation of snakes in a dream, reveals that the dreamer is hated by one of his family members and that the person is watching him and trying to collect as much information about his and his private life. Life intends to stab him with a poisoned knife. There is no doubt that this excessive hatred may be caused by the fact that the dreamer’s life is beautiful and calm, and hence the heart of this envious person is on fire and he wants to discharge his negative energy into the dreamer’s life to see him sad. And break. Sixth: Not everyone we deal with wishes us, and the vision reveals that the dreamer is surrounded with many enemies in his field of work. His colleagues may hate him because he is diligent and efficient, and his work receives great praise from his superiors, and this will make these haters meet soon to expel him and get rid of him. Seventh: This insect can confirm that the fortuneteller is about to make a move that is not in his favor. Almost like choosing something that will grow sad and sad. If an unmarried woman sees this scene, it can be interpreted that she will choose someone who is not worthy of being a husband and father and she will become attached to him, and after a while she will know very well that the decision she made was the worst decision in her life and she will suffer a lot of psychological pain because of it. Eighth One of the worst interpretations that one of the interpreters explained about the scorpion symbol is that the dreamer does not...

title: Interpretation of lightning in a dream: Seeing the sound of lightning in a dream

preview.html: Lightning for an unmarried woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, lightning and the sound of thunder and rain for Ibn Sirin. If he sees in a dream after lightning that the sky is raining, he will receive an apology or his opponent or enemy will forgive him. Lightning in a dream indicates fear, anxiety or terror from the ruler and the ruler and shows the threat or threat and punishment. Lightning in a dream also indicates a good promise or pleasure and acceptance or desire and hope when accompanied by lightning (12) is the one who shows you lightning for fear and hope and creates dense clouds. Lightning in a dream is the fear of the traveler and the greed of the resident or merchant or farmer for what follows the rain or beneficial rain, and it is a sign of good food or an increase in money. Lightning in a dream indicates a quick and quick profit due to the speed of its departure and not remaining in the sky. Whoever sees lightning in his dream without people, or sees its lights attracting attention or entering his house, it is good news of food or blessing or mercy. Terrible lightning in dreams indicates the ruler’s anger or wrath. If he does what contradicts the ruler or his orders and sees lightning in his dream, he fears for himself from punishment or tax or Disobedience or the like. Lightning in a sick person's dream indicates recovery if the dreamer sees rain or water after it. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is catching lightning or hunting it, he will do good or be just or achieve a clean and quick victory. Lightning in a dream also indicates fear followed by benefit, and it is said that lightning in a dream indicates a blessing that befalls the dreamer from a distant place or country. As for the one who sees in his dream that lightning burns his clothes, this is his interpretation of sadness or illness. Other interpretations of the lightning symbol in your dream Interpretation of a dream about lightning in a dream Commentators said that there are different indications and interpretations of seeing lightning in a dream, and thus the person who dreams that he saw lightning in a dream and a member of his family or a member of his family is absent, this is a good omen for the return of the absent: As for the person who dreams of seeing lightning in a dream and actually commits harmful and immoral acts, this means that this person will be guided after being misled, and if the person dreams of seeing strong lightning in a dream, this means that this person will have a positive force related to his work and personal life. Rain, which means that this person will receive good and happy news. Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream for a single woman Commentators said that the interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream for a single woman is an indication that she will receive good and happy news about something she has been waiting for. for a long time. Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream for a married and pregnant woman But if a married woman dreams that she saw lightning in her dream, this means that she will receive good news that she has been looking for regarding her children and their studies, or a matter related to work for her husband or herself. Reflection * of what she thinks about her fear at the time of the situation through the subconscious mind. Seeing lightning and thunder - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone I know proposing to me in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: When I saw a familiar person engaged to me in a dream, to a girl, to a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a widow, I dreamed that someone proposed to me, I dreamed that my lover was engaged by a known or unknown person to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of someone I know dealing with a dream. To dream of a girl getting engaged In someone she knows means she is already engaged. Al-Nabulsi interpreted this dream as evidence that he heard good and happy news in the coming period. But if the girl sees that she is engaged to a teacher in a school or university, this is evidence that she will obtain the highest grades in the tests. If she sees that she is engaged to her boss at work, this means that she will get To the highest positions in her work as soon as possible. If the girl is already engaged and sees in a dream that she is engaged to another person, this is evidence that she is not satisfied with him. If the dream comes true, this is good news for you to achieve what you want, good news for your engagement, and relief from your worries. God willing. Perhaps this person will propose to you, and perhaps there will be someone better than him and you will not object to him. Engagement in a dream sometimes embodies the realistic desire in a girl’s heart to get engaged and have a partner. Commitment in a dream reflects the desire to communicate and gain affection or emotional closeness, as this passion is lacking. Reality, and the oppression in the world of dreams explodes as an expression of this desire. If you dream that you are engaged to your lover, this reflects your desire, on the one hand, to bond with him and it is good to solve all the outstanding problems between you, financial or family, and that this connection will happen soon. If you dream that you are engaged To a stranger whose identity you do not know, this may symbolize that you may start a new relationship soon. If you dream that you broke off your engagement, this means that there are serious and vital issues in your life that require you to make a decisive decision about them. Ultimately, the positivity or negativity in the dream is related to your feelings While this experience is present in your dream. In general, getting engaged in a dream is an optimistic vision. Every virgin girl or married woman sees an engagement or engagement in her dream, and this calls for happiness and joy. The meaning of engagement in a dream for an unmarried girlIf she sees an engaged virgin girl in a dream By someone she knows, it means that she will receive good news from or about this person. The girl’s engagement or engagement in the dream means her steadfastness in the values ​​of truth, honor, work, and success. An engaged girl in a dream rejoices in the days of her youth, maintains her honor, acquires knowledge, and gains the admiration of others. And if she gets married: Her husband is good and pious. The meaning of engagement in a married woman’s dream: For a married woman, if she sees in a dream that she is engaged or betrothed to her husband, then all circumstances will improve, and she will be happy with her family and love her husband and children. If a married woman sees that her engagement or engagement is with a stranger, this means that there is someone He interferes in her life and disturbs her peace. The meaning of engagement in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for a pregnant woman, if she sees in her dream or dreams of her engagement or engagement, this indicates a positive change in her life after giving birth and a change in her life.

If a married woman sees that her engagement or engagement is with a stranger, this means that there is someone He interferes in her life and disturbs her peace. The meaning of engagement in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for a pregnant woman, if she sees in her dream or dreams of her engagement or engagement, this indicates a positive change in her life after giving birth and a change in her life.
